text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet jp-family-member-vs

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a FAMMEMB
  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    FAMMEMB家族A relationship between two people characterizing their "familial" relationship
    CHILD子供The player of the role is a child of the scoping entity.
    CHLDADOPT養子The player of the role is a child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.
    DAUADOPT養女The player of the role is a female child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.
    SONADOPT養子（男子）The player of the role is a male child taken into a family through legal means and raised by the scoping person (parent) as his or her own child.
    CHLDFOST里子The player of the role is a child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.
    DAUFOST里子（女子）The player of the role is a female child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.
    SONFOST里子（男子）The player of the role is a male child receiving parental care and nurture from the scoping person (parent) but not related to him or her through legal or blood ties.
    DAUC娘**Description:** The player of the role is a female child (of any type) of scoping entity (parent)
    DAU実娘The player of the role is a female offspring of the scoping entity (parent).
    STPDAU継娘The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.
    NCHILD実子The player of the role is an offspring of the scoping entity as determined by birth.
    SON実息子The player of the role is a male offspring of the scoping entity (parent).
    SONC息子**Description:** The player of the role is a male child (of any type) of scoping entity (parent)
    STPSON継息子The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.
    STPCHLD継子The player of the role is a child of the scoping person's spouse by a previous union.
    EXT親族（直系血族を除く）**Description:** A family member not having an immediate genetic or legal relationship e.g. Aunt, cousin, great grandparent, grandchild, grandparent, niece, nephew or uncle.
    AUNT伯母（叔母）The player of the role is a sister of the scoping person's mother or father.
    MAUNT母方の伯母（叔母）**Description:**The player of the role is a biological sister of the scoping person's biological mother.
    PAUNT父方の伯母（叔母）**Description:**The player of the role is a biological sister of the scoping person's biological father.
    COUSNいとこThe player of the role is a relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor, such as a grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.
    MCOUSN母方のいとこ**Description:**The player of the role is a biological relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor on the player's mother's side, such as a grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.
    PCOUSN父方のいとこ**Description:**The player of the role is a biological relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor on the player's father's side, such as a grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.
    GGRPRN曽祖父母The player of the role is a parent of the scoping person's grandparent.
    GGRFTH曽祖父The player of the role is the father of the scoping person's grandparent.
    MGGRFTH母方の曽祖父**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological mother's parent.
    PGGRFTH父方の曽祖父**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological father's parent.
    GGRMTH曾祖母The player of the role is the mother of the scoping person's grandparent.
    MGGRMTH母方の曾祖母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological mother's parent.
    PGGRMTH父方の曾祖母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological father's parent.
    MGGRPRN母方の曽祖父母**Description:**The player of the role is a biological parent of the scoping person's biological mother's parent.
    PGGRPRN父方の曽祖父母**Description:**The player of the role is a biological parent of the scoping person's biological father's parent.
    GRNDCHILD孫The player of the role is a child of the scoping person's son or daughter.
    GRNDDAU孫娘The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's son or daughter.
    GRNDSON孫息子The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's son or daughter.
    GRPRN祖父母The player of the role is a parent of the scoping person's mother or father.
    GRFTH祖父The player of the role is the father of the scoping person's mother or father.
    MGRFTH母方の祖父**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological mother.
    PGRFTH父方の祖父**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological father.
    GRMTH祖母The player of the role is the mother of the scoping person's mother or father.
    MGRMTH母方の祖母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological mother.
    PGRMTH父方の祖母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological father.
    MGRPRN母方の祖父母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological parent of the scoping person's biological mother.
    PGRPRN父方の祖父母**Description:**The player of the role is the biological parent of the scoping person's biological father.
    INLAW義理A relationship between an individual and a member of their spousal partner's immediate family.
    CHLDINLAW義理の子供The player of the role is the spouse of scoping person's child.
    DAUINLAW義理の娘The player of the role is the wife of scoping person's son.
    SONINLAW義理の息子The player of the role is the husband of scoping person's daughter.
    PRNINLAW義理の親The player of the role is the parent of scoping person's husband or wife.
    FTHINLAW義理の父The player of the role is the father of the scoping person's husband or wife.
    MTHINLAW義理の母The player of the role is the mother of the scoping person's husband or wife.
    SIBINLAW義理の兄弟The player of the role is: (1) a sibling of the scoping person's spouse, or (2) the spouse of the scoping person's sibling, or (3) the spouse of a sibling of the scoping person's spouse.
    BROINLAW義理の兄The player of the role is: (1) a brother of the scoping person's spouse, or (2) the husband of the scoping person's sister, or (3) the husband of a sister of the scoping person's spouse.
    SISINLAW義理の姉The player of the role is: (1) a sister of the scoping person's spouse, or (2) the wife of the scoping person's brother, or (3) the wife of a brother of the scoping person's spouse.
    NIENEPH甥姪The player of the role is a child of scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the scoping person's spouse.
    NEPHEW甥The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the scoping person's spouse.
    NIECE姪The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the scoping person's spouse.
    UNCLE伯父（叔父）The player of the role is a brother of the scoping person's mother or father.
    MUNCLE母方の伯父（叔父）**Description:**The player of the role is a biological brother of the scoping person's biological mother.
    PUNCLE父方の伯父（叔父）**Description:**The player of the role is a biological brother of the scoping person's biological father.
    PRN親The player of the role is one who begets, gives birth to, or nurtures and raises the scoping entity (child).
    ADOPTP養父母The player of the role (parent) has taken the scoper (child) into their family through legal means and raises them as his or her own child.
    ADOPTF養父The player of the role (father) is a male who has taken the scoper (child) into their family through legal means and raises them as his own child.
    ADOPTM養子母The player of the role (father) is a female who has taken the scoper (child) into their family through legal means and raises them as her own child.
    FTH父The player of the role is a male who begets or raises or nurtures the scoping entity (child).
    FTHFOST養父The player of the role (parent) who is a male state-certified caregiver responsible for the scoper (child) who has been placed in the parent's care. The placement of the child is usually arranged through the government or a social-service agency, and temporary.

    The state, via a jurisdiction recognized child protection agency, stands as in loco parentis to the child, making all legal decisions while the foster parent is responsible for the day-to-day care of the specified child.
    NFTH実父The player of the role is a male who begets the scoping entity (child).
    NFTHF胎児の実父Indicates the biologic male parent of a fetus.
    STPFTH継父The player of the role is the husband of scoping person's mother and not the scoping person's natural father.
    MTH母親The player of the role is a female who conceives, gives birth to, or raises and nurtures the scoping entity (child).
    GESTM代理の母The player is a female whose womb carries the fetus of the scoper. Generally used when the gestational mother and natural mother are not the same.
    MTHFOST養母The player of the role (parent) who is a female state-certified caregiver responsible for the scoper (child) who has been placed in the parent's care. The placement of the child is usually arranged through the government or a social-service agency, and temporary.

    The state, via a jurisdiction recognized child protection agency, stands as in loco parentis to the child, making all legal decisions while the foster parent is responsible for the day-to-day care of the specified child.
    NMTH実母The player of the role is a female who conceives or gives birth to the scoping entity (child).
    NMTHF胎児の実母The player is the biologic female parent of the scoping fetus.
    STPMTH継母The player of the role is the wife of scoping person's father and not the scoping person's natural mother.
    NPRN実の親
    PRNFOST里親The player of the role (parent) who is a state-certified caregiver responsible for the scoper (child) who has been placed in the parent's care. The placement of the child is usually arranged through the government or a social-service agency, and temporary.

    The state, via a jurisdiction recognized child protection agency, stands as in loco parentis to the child, making all legal decisions while the foster parent is responsible for the day-to-day care of the specified child.
    STPPRN継親The player of the role is the spouse of the scoping person's parent and not the scoping person's natural parent.
    SIB同胞（兄弟姉妹）The player of the role shares one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.
    BRO兄弟The player of the role is a male sharing one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.
    HBRO半同胞の兄弟The player of the role is a male related to the scoping entity by sharing only one biological parent.
    NBRO実の兄弟（完全同胞の兄弟）The player of the role is a male having the same biological parents as the scoping entity.
    TWINBRO双子の兄弟The scoper was carried in the same womb as the male player and shares common biological parents.
    FTWINBRO二卵性双生児の兄弟The scoper was carried in the same womb as the male player and shares common biological parents but is the product of a distinct egg/sperm pair.
    ITWINBRO一卵性双生児の兄弟The male scoper is an offspring of the same egg-sperm pair as the male player.
    STPBRO義理の兄弟The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's stepparent.
    HSIB半同胞The player of the role is related to the scoping entity by sharing only one biological parent.
    HSIS半同胞の姉妹The player of the role is a female related to the scoping entity by sharing only one biological parent.
    NSIB完全同胞The player of the role has both biological parents in common with the scoping entity.
    NSIS実の姉妹（完全同胞の姉妹）The player of the role is a female having the same biological parents as the scoping entity.
    TWINSIS双子の姉妹The scoper was carried in the same womb as the female player and shares common biological parents.
    FTWINSIS二卵性双生児姉妹The scoper was carried in the same womb as the female player and shares common biological parents but is the product of a distinct egg/sperm pair.
    ITWINSIS一卵性双生児姉妹The female scoper is an offspring of the same egg-sperm pair as the female player.
    TWIN双子The scoper and player were carried in the same womb and shared common biological parents.
    FTWIN二卵性双生児The scoper and player were carried in the same womb and share common biological parents but are the product of distinct egg/sperm pairs.
    ITWIN一卵性双生児The scoper and player are offspring of the same egg-sperm pair.
    SIS姉妹The player of the role is a female sharing one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.
    STPSIS継姉妹The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's stepparent.
    STPSIB継親の子The player of the role is a child of the scoping person's stepparent.
    SIGOTHR重要なパートナーA person who is important to one's well being; especially a spouse or one in a similar relationship. (The player is the one who is important)
    DOMPART内縁のパートナーThe player of the role cohabits with the scoping person but is not the scoping person's spouse.
    FMRSPS元配偶者Player of the role was previously joined to the scoping person in marriage and this marriage is now dissolved and inactive.

    *Usage Note:* This is significant to indicate as some jurisdictions have different legal requirements for former spouse to access the patient's record, from a general friend.
    SPS配偶者The player of the role is a marriage partner of the scoping person.
    HUSB夫The player of the role is a man joined to a woman (scoping person) in marriage.
    WIFE妻The player of the role is a woman joined to a man (scoping person) in marriage.

name: JP_FamilyMember_VS
title: JP Core Family Member ValueSet
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)

concept.display: 実の兄弟（完全同胞の兄弟）
実の姉妹（完全同胞の姉妹）
